about_the_game:
About Chinese expansion pack


This DLC is used for replacing the English contents in our game, which aims to make the Chinese contents in our game more fluent.

The playeres who choose the Language: English don't download this for your game, thank you.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
About Chinese expansion pack


This DLC is used for replacing the English contents in our game, which aims to make the Chinese contents in our game more fluent.

The playeres who choose the Language: English don't download this for your game, thank you.
legal_notice:
All characters in the game are adults over 18 years old.
“Return to LI World” is a romantic PRG where players will see some suggestive dialogues. Please note that all CG in the game do not contain any direct body parts or nudity. However, this game can be modified by the players’ own mods and this disclaimer does not apply to the modified contents.
name: Return to li World - Chinese expansion pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

short_description: This dlc is set for Chinese players, replaces the English content in the game, and modifies the English dialogue to be more in line with the narrative style of Chinese players
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
